item.title: 【HD Live Performances】WEB-DL - Miley Cyrus - ATTENTION Tour Movie [Extended] 2160p Dolby Digital Plus (5.1)
item.description:
​

The extended version has arrived! ​

05 songs have been added.
Fixed some translations in the subtitles, but the bug when displaying subtitles is still present.
Added Colombia location to play Angels Like You song.

Text reference from normal version: - Link: WEB-DL - Miley Cyrus - ATTENTION Tour Movie 2160p Dolby Digital Plus (5.1) | ShareMania.US

"Hello everyone, today I'm posting this movie made by not so secret lab and me about Miley Cyrus ATTENTION tour. For those who want to see it again with different perspectives from each country.

What does this movie contain?

4 locations (Argentina, Brazil, Chile and Los Angeles)
Dolby Atmos sound (5.1) extracted from TIDAL and synchronized with the video.
English and Spanish subtitles

Some highlights.

Due to the fact that the audio was recorded in only one location, the synchronization with the video is not 100% correct, we apologize for that.
In some moments a black screen may appear, this is due to the fact that from that moment on, the audio and video are no longer synchronized and it looks bad for the viewer.
Edge Of Midnight was replaced by Midnight Sky (recorded in Argentina) by request of a person. The audio is moderately bad, even though we have improved and modified it so that it can be played in a 5.1 audio system.
The subtitles may have problems when displayed on screen, we have not been able to correct that

I hope I am not bothering anyone with this and if this movie is published elsewhere, please give credit to the authors."
